role: Integrate enhanced scanner outputs into planning workflows, impact analysis, and execution tracking

tasks.description: Update planning workflows (gather_context, create_plan) to use 95% accurate scanner data with full type coverage
tasks.implementation: Modify gather_context to read interfaces/decorators/type aliases from ElementData. Enhance create_plan to consider complexity metrics when estimating task effort and risk.

tasks.description: Enhance impact analysis to leverage relationship data (imports/exports/dependencies) for accurate change impact assessment
tasks.implementation: Update impact analysis functions to use ElementData.dependencies, ElementData.usedBy for transitive dependency analysis. Generate impact graphs showing downstream effects.

tasks.description: Integrate complexity data into execution tracking for refactoring prioritization and risk assessment
tasks.implementation: Add complexity scores to task breakdown, flag high-complexity elements (>10) as refactoring candidates, adjust time estimates based on complexity.

criteria: Planning workflows include full type coverage (interfaces/decorators)
